location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 22: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra] to [John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it can be assumed that it is addressed to the Resident at Bushire, John Beaumont. The first part of the letter is dated 27 March 1779; a postcript to the letter is dated 29 March 1779. In the letter, William Digges Latouche and George Abraham report that Sadoo Caun [Sadiq Khan] has departed from Goordilan for Schiraz [Shiraz].
